context: Block, Inc. is a financial technology and digital payments company focused on Square merchant services, Cash App, and Bitcoin through Spiral. Square went public. Point-of-sale hardware and software for SMBs.

competitors.name: PayPal Here
competitors.notes: PayPal's mobile card reader competing with Square

competitors.name: Clover (First Data)
competitors.notes: POS system for restaurants and retail

competitors.name: Verifone
competitors.notes: Traditional payment terminals competing in SMB

competitors.name: iZettle
competitors.notes: European mobile POS later acquired by PayPal

competitors.name: Stripe
competitors.notes: Online payments competing for software integration

competitors.name: Traditional Merchant Services
competitors.notes: Banks and processors like Chase, Elavon
